ja474:6.2: Khaṇaṃ muhuttañca mante na passaṃ → khaṇaṃ muhuttaṃ na maṃ tosayanti (bj, pts1)
ja474:7.3: Sayaṃ harī → athāharī (bj) | athāhari (s2, s3, pts1)
ja474:8.1: pure hi → pura'ssa (bj, pts1) | purepi (s2, s3)
ja474:9.4: atthaṃ → mā taṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1), vijaheyya manto → vijaheyyu mantā (s2, s3)
ja474:14.6: punappadāhi → punappasīda (bj, pts1) | puna sampadāhi (s2, s3)
ja474:15.2: Tuvampi dhammena → tvampi dhammeneva (mr), pariggahesi → paṭiggahesi (bj, pts1)
ja474:16.3: Kiñcāpi laddhā jīvituṃ appapañño → kicchā laddhā jīvikaṃ appapañño (bj) | kicchā laddhaṃ jīvitaṃ appapañño (s2, s3) | kicchāpi laddhā jīvikaṃ appañña (pts1)
